person.persName: Wesley Smith (Hardin County, Kentucky, former enslaved person)

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, former enslaved person. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Smith. Father of Wesley Smith and Phillip Smith. Enslaved person in Hardin County, Kentucky in 1863. Served in Company H of the 109th USCT as Private (serving as a substitute for W.M. Evans) from June 2, 1864 to February 6, 1866.
